column4: troc, its not letting me upload the images from my local machine to the online server,
I went to the files and tried to change the owner, but it wont let me, how do I become root?
you've just shown us the command
tried it but didnt work I think, lets make the question how do I change the owner to myself, because the owner now is root and I want the owner to be alloosh
I have been doing that, would you be so kind and give me the command for once:)
what have you been doing, show me the command
using man, it gets me confused, the other day I spent 2 hours on that, so I only want the command :)
show me the chown command you have been using
it goes like chown owner file_or_bath_to_file_ir_dir
I know how to use chown
I told YOU have to use chown
I know and I said thanks, and told you I figured it out:) actually iam happy because you didnt give me the command directly as I asked:)
